EmailTemplate.name: 202007_Global_CPS_Sarasota_Email_Operational.Email 1 Sarasota
EmailTemplate.subject: Cabin Management Systems are now support through MyAerospace
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell Customer,
You were recently notified that Honeywellâ€™s Cabin Management Systems were migrating to SAP. This globally-integrated business platform will allow us to provide greater speed, accuracy, and consistency in meeting your needs. In addition, it enables integration with the applications available on the MyAerospace portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=sarasota-operational]]>.
What is MyAerospace? MyAerospace offers a variety of digital tools to help keep your business running smoothly. Create an account today and utilize your digital service subscriptions, place and manage orders online and access information such as technical documents and more.
Need help using the MyAerospace portal?
- Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/register?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=sarasota-operational]]> for information on how to register for MyAerospace account - Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/username?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=sarasota-operational]]> for information on how to find your username - Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/reset-password?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=sarasota-operational]]> for information on how to change your password - Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training/topics/online-ordering?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=sarasota-operational]]> for information on how to place an order through the portal - Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/training?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=sarasota-operational]]> for more trainings & information on how to use MyAerospace
Need help navigating the MyAerospace portal? Click here to request support <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_cps&utm_content=sarasota-operational]]>.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support
